com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui

Class GuiCheckControllersFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.GuiCheckControllersFactory

  • public class GuiCheckControllersFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating GuiCheckControllers. A GuiCheckController is used to control the work and information flow before and while checking.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      • createGuiCheckController

      • createGuiCheckControllerWithDefaultServerSideStore

        public GuiCheckController createGuiCheckControllerWithDefaultServerSideStore(ViewFactory viewFactory,
                                                                    ConnectionSettingsStore connectionSettingsStore,
                                                                    PluginSettingsStore pluginSettingsStore,
                                                                    AcrolinxClient client,
                                                                    ExtensionSettingsStore extensionSettinsStore)
        This is the most simple way to get an GuiCheckController; it stores its connectionSettings in a local file and saves its CheckSettings on the server.
        Parameters:
        viewFactory - the view factory returned by GuiSWTFactory or GuiSwingFactory or your implementation
        connectionSettingsStore - store where the connection settings are stored, see GuiFactory.connectionSettingsStores()
        pluginSettingsStore - the plug-in settings store, see GuiFactory.pluginSettingsStores()
        extensionSettinsStore -
        client - get one by calling getClientInformation
        Returns:
        the GUI check controller
